catalyst: The photocatalysts used in the experiment were TiO2 nanocrystals with tailored exposed facets, including octahedra (TiO2(O)), truncated octahedra (TiO2(T)), and sheets with dominant (0 0 1) facets (TiO2(S)). Spherical Au nanoparticles were also used to enhance catalytic activity.
co_catalyst: Au (Gold) is used as a co-catalyst in the experiment.
